product_name: REI Sahara Shorts - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: Soft and durable REI Sahara plus-size shorts are ready to hit the trail. They feature quick-drying fabric and plenty of pocket space for your trail goodies. Breathable, quick drying nylon offers superb comfort, performance and packability; a Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off to keep shorts dryer. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Zip fly and fixed belt loops; internal elastic and button adjustment at waist personalize the fit. Crotch gusset ensures good mobility. 2 hand pockets, 2 zippered thigh pockets and 2 back pockets. REI Sahara shorts feature a comfortable, relaxed fit.
short_description: Soft and durable REI Sahara plus-size shorts are ready to hit the trail. They feature quick-drying fabric and plenty of pocket space for your trail goodies.
